faq.title: Clear Answers, Expert Insights, Hassle Free Consulting Experience

items.question: Who can draft a UAE-compliant shareholder agreement?
items.answer: While you can create a shareholder agreement, you run the risk of non-compliance, writing ambiguous clauses, or skipping key information. For this reason, our expert lawyers help you draft documents tailored to your company’s requirements.

items.question: Why should you hire an expert shareholder agreement drafting lawyer?
items.answer: Working with an expert shareholder agreement lawyer can help you protect your business’s interests, define power and equity, and capture investors.

items.question: How long does One Nexuz require to draft a shareholders agreement?
items.answer: Our experts provide you with a customised shareholders agreement within 1-2 weeks, depending on your industry, legal structure, and unique business needs.

items.question: Can I update my shareholder agreement to add new shareholders?
items.answer: Yes, our seasoned shareholder agreement lawyers can refine your existing shareholder agreement to add new members.

items.question: Will my shareholder agreement stay confidential?
items.answer: Yes, shareholder agreements are private contracts and do not need to be submitted to any public parties. You may need to disclose certain clauses to investors, banks, or auditors.
